attributes.action: present a bill making it illegal for suppliers to charge customers a fee for accepting payment of their invoices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A number of large companies are proposing to charge customers extra for accepting payment from them in any form other than direct debit. This will affect the most vulnerable people most as they are the ones least likely to have bank accounts.BT is leading the way and if they succeed many others are bound to follow. Companies cannot be allowed to penalise customers for paying their bills in legal tender or by any of the other traditional means.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
